FuncDef: This command configures theline-lengthparameter of the BITS output, This is the distance in feet between the network element and the office clock (BITS/SSU). There are two possible BITS-out interfaces, one for each CPM. They are configured together, but they are displayed separately in the show command. This command is only applicable when the interface-type is DS1.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the distance is from 0 to 110 feet.
Specifies that the distance is from 110 to 220 feet.
Specifies that the distance is from 220 to 330 feet.
Specifies that the distance is from 330 to 440 feet.
Specifies that the distance is from 440 to 550 feet.
Specifies that the distance is from 550 to 660 feet.
